data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Joe: I'm ____ sorry, I ____ the ____ and couldn't come.
Becky: Well ____ you ____ to ____ again ____ Saturday?

data.partBlankContent:
Becky: Where were you? I tho____ we we__ going t_ the mov___ at 8!
Joe: I'm s_ sorry, I mis___ the b__ and couldn't come.
Becky: Well d_ you wa__ to t__ again o_ Saturday?
Joe: I'd lo__ to! This time I will drive myself so I won't be late.
data.fullContent: Becky: Where were you? I thought we were going to the movies at 8! Joe: I'm so sorry, I missed the bus and couldn't come. Becky: Well do you want to try again on Saturday? Joe: I'd love to! This time I will drive myself so I won't be late.
data.answer: 贝琪:你去哪儿了?我还以为我们8点要去看电影呢! 乔:真对不起，我错过了公共汽车，没能来。 贝琪:那么，你想星期六再来一遍吗? 乔:我很乐意!这次我要自己开车，这样就不会迟到了。
